an10.100:1.1: “Mendicants, without giving up ten things you can’t realize perfection.
an10.100:1.3: Greed, hate, delusion, anger, hostility, disdain, contempt, jealousy, stinginess, and conceit.
an10.100:1.4: Without giving up these ten things you can’t realize perfection.
an10.100:2.1: After giving up ten things you can realize perfection.
an10.100:2.3: Greed, hate, delusion, anger, hostility, disdain, contempt, jealousy, stinginess, and conceit.
an10.100:2.4: After giving up these ten things you can realize perfection.”
